CustomerInfraDto.title: CustomerInfraDto
CustomerInfraDto.description:
Properties stored by DB are represented here for data transfer
over the wire.
1. Some inferred information that is not stored in DB but is logically
inferred from given attributes shall come here using @property.
These fields are not written to database.

2. In case, you need to store extra information which can't be done by [1].
Define override exclude_extras attributes in the dto class. This will not
be persisted to database in create and update.

3. We can add extra relationship in sqlalchemy models that needs to be part of
dto to save code but on updates won't be persisted to database by using extras
mentioned in [2].

SelfServeMigrationStatus.title: SelfServeMigrationStatus
SelfServeMigrationStatus.description:
This represents the current Self Serve Migration Status of the line
NOT_DONE => Data on the line is not migrated to StationDataConfig
TESTING => Data on the line is not migrated to StationDataConfig
DONE => Data on the line is not migrated to StationDataConfig
